timeline.message: Issue 13576: FAT test update for new JOSE typ header value

timeline.bodyText: Not terribly important, but the failure message here references the key not being large enough but the actual failure will be for an unknown/invalid key management algorithm.

timeline.bodyText: I'm not seeing any difference between this test and JwtBuilderAPIBasicTests_encryptWith_useSameSettingsAsBuilderConfig.

replies.bodyText:
Cut/paste error:  JwtBuilderAPIBasicTests_encryptWith_useSameSettingsAsBuilderConfig should have used RS256 to override the RS256 in the config.  Thought I'd fixed that.
Will deliver with the consumer tests I'm working now.
